member.name: DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_FLAGS
member.summary: Flags used with to specify the amount of info to report about an object's lifetime.

member.name: DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_FLAGS.DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_SUMMARY
member.summary: A flag that specifies to obtain a summary about an object's lifetime.

member.name: DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_FLAGS.DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_DETAIL
member.summary: A flag that specifies to obtain detailed info about an object's lifetime.

member.name: DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_FLAGS.DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_IGNORE_INTERNAL
member.summary: This flag indicates to ignore objects which have no external refcounts keeping them alive. D3D objects are printed using an external refcount and an internal refcount. Typically, all objects are printed. This flag means ignore the objects whose external refcount is 0, because the application is not responsible for keeping them alive.

member.name: DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_FLAGS.DXGI_DEBUG_RLO_ALL
member.summary: A flag that specifies to obtain both a summary and detailed info about an object's lifetime.
